attributes.action: Stop the £38,700 rise and the rise in NHS fees
attributes.additional_details: With the rise in April of the income threshold raising to £38,700, this government will destroy relationships as well as long distance relationships who are wanting to marry and build their future together
attributes.background: Let the British people who are in long distance relationships bring their loved ones into the uk with the current income threshold of £18,600.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602

Do not increase visa fees and the Immigration Health Surcharge: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641140
